Berserk:




"I was sent here by forced by the council on Cybertron," he 
said. "They decided I was too dangerous to be around other bots due 
to by purpose orignally. I arrived here. Perhaps their plan was to 
send me somewhere where I would have no contact and be destroyed 
myself. Are you a prisioner here as well?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> 
> She felt his grip ease up and started to breath easier. "This is 
> earth. And welcome to the biggest mess in the galaxy. Oh, and I'm 
> DarkMouse by the way. How'd you get here? To the planet I mean?"
> 
> She glanced over and saw her gun in the middle of the hall way.  
She 
> kept her eyes on Bezerk. Even with out her gun, she still had her 
> optic lazars. If he tried anything, she's fire with them on him. 
But 
> for now, she would try to talk. Perhaps he might join them.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> > Berserk:
> > 
> > Berserk frowned at Dark Mouse. He never did like talking, but he 
> went 
> > along with it. He let go, keeping her to the wall, and left his 
> clash 
> > sword in his hand.
> > 
> > He nodded to her slowly, and said, "What planet am I on?"
